pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, January 16, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, January 16, 2017:

Halifax, Nova Scotia

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit Java Blend Coffee Roasters.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


Dartmouth, Nova Scotia

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Town Hall Q&A hosted by the Mayor of Halifax, Michael Savage.

110 Wyse Road
Dartmouth, Nova Scotia

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:30 p.m.


Media Appearances

3:30 p.m. – Live – Interview with Sheldon MacLeod for 95.7 FM, Rogers Radio Halifax

5:40 p.m. – Live – Interview with Bob Murphy for Mainstreet on CBC Radio One Nova Scotia.

Please note that all times are local.
